title: PP68  - Dining Chair - Natural Cord
body: Hans J. Wegner's final basic chair. Originally designed for the DSB (Danish Rail) ferries, production of the PP68 Dining Chair started in 1987. Made for long, cosy evenings around the dining table, the PP68 is genuinely comfortable, durable and classy. Another timeless masterpiece from the undisputed master of Danish chair design.
